**Radio Propagation Prediction Software**
=============================

**Notice Identification Number:** PW-22-01013673 

**Amendment 2**

**Solicitation Number:** W6369-23-X014

**Publication Date:** November 16, 2022

**Closing Date and Time:** December 12, 2022, at 14:00:00

**GSAIN (Global System for Award Management) Code:** N7050 - ADP Components

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Price

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Region of Opportunity:** Unspecified

**Region of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence

**Key Information:**

* The Department of National Defence (DND), through Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), is seeking a software package for wireless signal propagation prediction to support electronic warfare (EW) systems research.
* The software package must meet the requirements specified in the Statement of Requirement (SOR) attached to the solicitation document.
* All deliverables must be received within 30 days following contract award.
* The contract is not subject to a Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement, or Aboriginal business set aside.
* No security requirement is applicable to the Contract.
* Bidders must refer to the Request for Proposal (RFP) for detailed requirements.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The basis of selection shall be the compliant Bidder offering the lowest-cost compliant proposal.

**Submission:**

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Suppliers can view attachments on the Canada Buys [website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/4105719545f1f74b225e17acbc984ae0/w6369-23-x014_rfp_rfp_modification_001.pdf).

**Point of Contact:**
For further information, please contact [P.Daher, B](mailto:bruno.pedrozadaher@forces.gc.ca).
